ExpSyntax.val: INIPut (TranslateNR('[MAGIC_DATABASES]SourceDB_1_2_2_1 =* DBMS,21, %Database_1_db%, ,%Database_1_server%, ,%Database_1_user%, '&SharedValGet('IBDatabase_1_pass')&', NoMagicRecordLock, DontChangeFileInToolkit, NoCheckDefinition, NoCheckKey, NoFileLocks, SQLBLOB=%sql_blobsize%, , NoCheckExist, 0, %Database_1_db%, NoAS400SrvrSort,'),'FALSE'LOG)
